hero.title: How Can YU Help?
hero.description: Our law firm is committed to serving you and getting the justice you deserve! If you or a loved one has been impacted by legal challenges, call us at
hero.languages: We speak English, Spanish, Tagalog & Cebuano

practiceAreas.title: PRACTICE AREAS
practiceAreas.sectionDescription: At Yu Law Firm, we specialize exclusively in Personal Injury Law. Our dedicated team fights tirelessly for clients who have suffered injuries due to others' negligence, ensuring you receive the compensation and justice you deserve.
practiceAreas.description: We specialize in three key areas of law, providing expert guidance and compassionate support. Our experienced attorneys are dedicated to achieving the best possible outcomes for our clients.

personalInjury.title: Personal Injury
personalInjury.description: Fighting for the compensation you deserve after suffering injuries due to others' negligence or wrongdoing.
personalInjury.detailedDescription: Our personal injury attorneys handle car accidents, medical malpractice, workplace injuries, and wrongful death claims with dedication.

carAccidents.title: Car Accidents
carAccidents.description: If you've been hurt in a car crash, we'll help you get money for your medical bills, lost income, and pain. We handle all types of vehicle accidents.

slipAndFall.title: Slip and Fall
slipAndFall.description: Injured on someone else's property? We'll prove they were at fault and help you get the money you deserve for your injuries.

dogBites.title: Dog Bites & Animal Attacks
dogBites.description: Bitten or attacked by a dog or other animal? We'll hold the pet owner responsible and fight for your compensation.

truckAccidents.title: 18-Wheeler & Semi-Truck Accidents
truckAccidents.description: Truck accidents often cause serious injuries. We know how to handle complex truck accident cases and fight against big trucking companies.

workplaceInjuries.title: Workplace Injuries
workplaceInjuries.description: Hurt at work? We'll help you identify who's responsible beyond your employer and get you the full compensation you deserve.

wrongfulDeath.title: Wrongful Death
wrongfulDeath.description: Lost a loved one due to someone else's carelessness or actions? We provide compassionate support while fighting for justice and compensation for your family.

cta.title: Injured? We Can Help.
cta.description: Don't face the insurance companies alone. Our experienced team is ready to fight for the compensation you deserve. Free consultation – no fee unless we win.

familyLaw.title: Family Law
familyLaw.description: Navigating complex family matters with compassion and expertise. We understand that family issues are deeply personal and require sensitive handling.
familyLaw.detailedDescription: Our family law practice covers divorce, child custody, adoption, domestic violence protection, and property division with empathy and professionalism.

estatePlanning.title: Estate Planning
estatePlanning.description: Securing your family's future with comprehensive estate planning solutions tailored to your unique needs.
estatePlanning.detailedDescription: We provide expert guidance on wills, trusts, powers of attorney, and healthcare directives to protect your legacy and loved ones.

testimonials.title: CLIENT TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.description: Hear from our satisfied clients who have experienced the Yu Law Firm difference firsthand.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.description: Expert legal services in Personal Injury, Family Law, and Estate Planning with unwavering dedication to your success.
services.ctaDescription: Every legal challenge is unique. Let us provide you with a personalized consultation to discuss your specific needs and how we can help.

purpose.title: OUR PURPOSE
purpose.description: Specializing in Personal Injury, Family Law, and Estate Planning, our law firm is dedicated to serving as an unwavering support system. We provide steadfast legal guidance for individuals navigating the nuanced domains of these areas, positioning ourselves as your dedicated ally. Our commitment assures you that no challenge is deemed insurmountable with our support. Your peace of mind is our utmost priority, and we stand ready to simplify intricate legal matters, standing firmly by your side through every phase of your journey.

whyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE YU LAW FIRM?
whyChooseUs.description: Our commitment to excellence, personalized service, and proven results sets us apart. Discover why clients trust Yu Law Firm with their most important legal matters.
whyChooseUs.ctaText: Experience the Yu Law Firm difference for yourself.

expertExperience.title: Expert Experience
expertExperience.description: Years of specialized experience in our practice areas with proven track record.

personalAttention.title: Personal Attention
personalAttention.description: Every client receives personalized care and dedicated attention throughout their case.

openCommunication.title: Open Communication
openCommunication.description: We keep you informed throughout your legal journey with transparent communication.

provenResults.title: Proven Results
provenResults.description: Consistent track record of successful outcomes and satisfied clients across all practice areas.

settlements.title: SETTLEMENTS BY YU
settlements.description: Real results for real people. See how we've secured life-changing settlements for our clients.
settlements.ctaText: Ready to secure the settlement you deserve?

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Don't face your legal challenges alone. Contact Yu Law Firm today for a free consultation and let us help you navigate your path to justice.

faq.title: YOUR QUESTIONS
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our legal services, processes, and how we can help with your case.
faq.subDescription: Following an accident, there are always more questions than answers. At Yu Law Firm, we're here to answer any questions you have about your injury case.

noWinNoFee.question: How Does the "No Win No Fee" Promise Work?
noWinNoFee.answer: We work on a contingency fee basis, which means you don't pay attorney fees unless we win your case. We offer free initial consultations to evaluate your case and discuss your legal options without any upfront costs.

freeConsultation.question: Do I Have to Pay to Speak with an Injury Attorney?
freeConsultation.answer: No, we offer completely free consultations. There are no upfront costs or fees to discuss your case with our experienced legal team.

needAttorney.question: Do I Need a Personal Injury Attorney Help Me Settle My Case?
needAttorney.answer: While not required by law, having an experienced attorney significantly increases your chances of receiving fair compensation. Insurance companies often offer lower settlements to unrepresented individuals.

contingencyFee.question: What is a Contingency Fee?
contingencyFee.answer: A contingency fee means our payment is contingent on winning your case. You pay nothing upfront, and we only get paid when we secure compensation for you.

attorneyCost.question: How Much Does it Cost to Hire a Personal Injury Attorney?
attorneyCost.answer: There are no upfront costs. We work on contingency, meaning you only pay if we win your case. Our fee comes from the settlement or judgment we secure for you.

caseWorth.question: How Much Is My Personal Injury Case Worth?
caseWorth.answer: Case value depends on factors like medical expenses, lost wages, pain and suffering, and future costs. We provide free case evaluations to estimate your potential compensation.

faq.needAssistance: Need legal assistance in any of these areas?

reviews.title: CLIENT REVIEWS
reviews.description: Read what our clients have to say about their experience with Yu Law Firm. Real stories from real people who trusted us with their legal matters.
reviews.ctaDescription: We value your feedback and would love to hear about your experience with Yu Law Firm.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: Our proven legal strategy guides every case from initial consultation to final resolution, ensuring comprehensive representation and maximum compensation for our clients.

evaluation.title: Case Evaluation and Consultation
evaluation.description: We thoroughly analyze the details of your case, gather evidence, and provide you with a clear understanding of your legal options and potential outcomes.

planning.title: Strategic Legal Planning
planning.description: Our experienced team develops a comprehensive legal strategy tailored to your specific situation, ensuring maximum compensation for your injuries.

resolution.title: Negotiation and Resolution
resolution.description: We aggressively negotiate with insurance companies and opposing parties to secure the best possible settlement or take your case to trial if necessary.
